title: Searching for a Font that looks like SimpleType?
content:
Has anyone ever heard of a font called SimpleType? It's a san serif condensed font that one of my coworkers got as freeware. Now the art director want to use something that looks exactly like it but that we can buy and have a license for. Does anyone know a similar font? See attachment.

Many thanks!

diane t.

This font was sold as freeware by Swfte International.

Link to the font is here

[http://typophile.com/files/Picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151848/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture "http://typophile.com/files/Picture") 2\_5.jpg
author: dianetch

comments.content: Diane, your link isn't working can't you upload it again?

I'll try to upload again...And repost to the type ID forum.

Thanks,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151848im_/http:/typophile.com/files/simple_type_6583.png)

Diane
Alternate Gothic and Trade Gothic Condensed are both popular typefaces that resemble your sample.

Thanks you guys...these are good suggestions. I'll run them by my AD.

diane t.
